recipe.title: Green Beans with Thai-Style Sesame Sauce
ingredients: 1/2 pound green beans, preferably small, cut into 1-inch lengths
instructions: 1. Steam the green beans over boiling water until just tender. 2. In a medium bowl, blend together the cashew butter, sesame oil, vinegar, honey, tamari, and ginger. Add the beans and toss to coat. Serve at room temperature.
